[ text to jing: ]
you know, just because you came back to life, doesn't mean you'll suddenly know everything
or that everything will feel good, or that your choice will feel right, or whatever
you did, at the time, what you thought was right for you, and that is all that matters

and you know
life isn't an easy thing. i think a lotta people take coming back to life as being "the easy option"
but life is tough. you got a whole society to worry about, as well as all of the other things:
family, friends, money, jobs, school, houses, food, morality, mortality. big things.
a whole bunch of tough stuff to deal with -- things that make people wanna escape life in the first place
but hey. it's not like reaperdom doesn't have problems like that too, right?
sure, they might be a little different. maybe you don't have to worry about things like school
maybe you wouldn't have even noticed the different types of problems at first
but being ALIVE is what gives life problems, no matter how you might be living it
whether you're living it in wonderland, or on the streets of london, or in the clouds above, or in a pool of static

so naw, you didn't do the wrong thing, because coming back to life was what you wanted to do at the time
like you said -- you can always just get hit by another truck if you really wanted back in
( not that i would reccommend it, since that would hurt a crap tonne )

plus-- i'm sure all your reaper friends are asking why you didn't come with them
just because they love you so dang much
and wanna keep you all to themselves, he he he

all in all, kid -- give yourself some time
life's answers won't just come to you like that
take this precious second chance, and the time it's given you, into consideration
as you think about what you wanna do, and all the possibilities you have
then when you just can't think about it anymore -- follow your heart
because no matter what anyone else says
your heart is always the right one in the end

ok, jing?

because no matter what YOU choose --
i know i wanna play with you again too
and i know that we can make anything work out if we want
alright?
